DOC.brief_summary: To assess compare efficacy safety ciprofloxacin extended-release ( CIPRO XR ) tablet 1000 mg PO once-daily ( OD ) versus ciprofloxacin immediate-release ( CIPRO IR ) tablet 500 mg PO twice-daily ( BID ) 7-14 day patient complicate and/or nosocomial urinary tract infection ( cUTI ) .
